title: A new game mode - BYO Champion
body:
Build Your Own Champion. You take any champions you want, their model and base stats and add whichever 4 skills you wish to apply, 3 of any normal and one ult from anyone. And I don't mean one Q, W and E, I mean a Quinn with her R and a Teemo Q, a Nasus Q and a Jax E.

You could take 5 tanky champions all with 45% CDR and a Teemo Ult, just imagine what you can build.
